name: Elastic Security Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Elastic Security Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Elastic Security API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Elastic Security API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: case

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create

connectorId.name: connectorId
connectorId.description: Connectors allow you to send Elastic Security cases into other systems (only ServiceNow, Jira, or IBM Resilient). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
connectorId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connector Name or ID | 作用: Connectors allow you to send Elastic Security cases into other systems (only ServiceNow, Jira, or IBM Resilient). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

connectorType.name: connectorType
connectorType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connector Type | 默认值: .jira | (必填项)

issueType.name: issueType
issueType.description: Type of the Jira issue to create for this case
issueType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Issue Type | 作用: Type of the Jira issue to create for this case | (必填项)

priority.name: priority
priority.description: Priority of the Jira issue to create for this case
priority.natural_language_description: 参数名: Priority | 作用: Priority of the Jira issue to create for this case | (必填项)

urgency.name: urgency
urgency.description: Urgency of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case
urgency.natural_language_description: 参数名: Urgency | 作用: Urgency of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

severity.name: severity
severity.description: Severity of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case
severity.natural_language_description: 参数名: Severity | 作用: Severity of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

impact.name: impact
impact.description: Impact of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case
impact.natural_language_description: 参数名: Impact | 作用: Impact of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

category.name: category
category.description: Category of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case
category.natural_language_description: 参数名: Category | 作用: Category of the ServiceNow ITSM issue to create for this case | (必填项)

issueTypes.name: issueTypes
issueTypes.description: Comma-separated list of numerical types of the IBM Resilient issue to create for this case
issueTypes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Issue Types | 作用: Comma-separated list of numerical types of the IBM Resilient issue to create for this case | (必填项)

severityCode.name: severityCode
severityCode.description: Severity code of the IBM Resilient issue to create for this case
severityCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Severity Code | 作用: Severity code of the IBM Resilient issue to create for this case | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: owner (值: None) - Valid application owner registered within the Cases Role Based Access Control system

caseId.name: caseId
caseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Case ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: tags (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

sortOptions.name: sortOptions
sortOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort | 默认值: {}

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: syncAlerts (值: None) - Whether to synchronize with alerts

comment.name: comment
comment.description: Text to replace current comment message
comment.natural_language_description: 参数名: Comment | 作用: Text to replace current comment message | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

commentId.name: commentId
commentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Comment ID | (必填项)

tag.name: tag
tag.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tag.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: Connectors allow you to send Elastic Security cases into other systems (only ServiceNow, Jira, or IBM Resilient)
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connector Name | 作用: Connectors allow you to send Elastic Security cases into other systems (only ServiceNow, Jira, or IBM Resilient) | (必填项)

apiUrl.name: apiUrl
apiUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: API URL | 作用: URL of the third-party instance | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Jira-registered email | (必填项)

apiToken.name: apiToken
apiToken.natural_language_description: 参数名: API Token | 作用: Jira API token | (必填项)

projectKey.name: projectKey
projectKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Key | 作用: Jira Project Key | (必填项)

username.name: username
username.natural_language_description: 参数名: Username | 作用: ServiceNow ITSM username | (必填项)

password.name: password
password.natural_language_description: 参数名: Password | 作用: ServiceNow ITSM password | (必填项)

apiKeyId.name: apiKeyId
apiKeyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: API Key ID | 作用: IBM Resilient API key ID | (必填项)

apiKeySecret.name: apiKeySecret
apiKeySecret.natural_language_description: 参数名: API Key Secret | 作用: IBM Resilient API key secret | (必填项)

orgId.name: orgId
orgId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization ID | 作用: IBM Resilient organization ID | (必填项)
